public class ImageReadWrite
extends java.lang.Object

Reads and writes images (png, jpg).

David Bahr

ImageReadWrite

public ImageReadWrite()
Method Detail

appendDefaultImageSuffix

public static java.lang.String appendDefaultImageSuffix(java.lang.String filePath)
Appends a valid image suffix (like .jpg) if the file path does not already have a valid image suffix.

Parameters:
filePath - The path to the file where the image will be saved.
Returns:
The file path with a default image suffix appended if a valid suffix was not present.

isPermittedImageType

public static boolean isPermittedImageType(java.lang.String suffix)
Decides if the file suffix is one of the supported image formats. Only jpg and png are supported.

Parameters:
suffix - The suffix being tested, which should not include a "."
Returns:
true if the suffix matches one of the supported image formats.

read

public static void read(java.lang.String filePath,
                        TwoDimensionalLattice lattice)
Reads an image from a file and updates the cells to contain this info. Automatically converts the image to grey scale. Also scales the image to the size of the current CA lattice.

Parameters:
filePath - The path to the image that will be read.
lattice - The CA lattice.

save

public static void save(LatticePanel panel,
                        java.lang.String filePath)
Save the cellular automaton graphics to an image (png or jpg).

Parameters:
panel - The CA panel that draws the CA graphics.
filePath - The path to the file where the image will be saved.
